public class ProfileController
extends java.lang.Object

      • initBinder

        @InitBinder
public void initBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder webDataBinder)
        This method registers StringTrimmer in form. When a form is submitted, it trims all String type input fields
        Parameters:
        webDataBinder - instance of WebDataBinder (Populated by Spring)
        Since:
        2020-05-15

      • showProfile

        @GetMapping
public java.lang.String showProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                 @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                 UserDetailsImpl userDetails)
        This method returns the profile information of currently logged in user.
        Parameters:
        model - for storing model data to render in view (Populated by Spring)
        userDetails - currently authenticated user (Populated by Spring)
        Returns:
        view page of user profile
        Since:
        2020-05-17

      • showUpdate

        @GetMapping(value="/update")
public java.lang.String showUpdate(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                 UserDetailsImpl userDetails,
                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This method return the form to update the profile with profile data injected.
        Parameters:
        userDetails - currently authenticated user (Populated by Spring)
        model - for storing model data to render in view (Populated by Spring)
        Returns:
        update form
        Since:
        2020-05-17

      • updateProfile

        @PostMapping(value="/update")
public java.lang.String updateProfile(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                     @Valid UserProfile updateUser,
                                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                     @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                     UserDetailsImpl userDetails)
        This methods accepts the form data and calls the profileService to update user profile.
        Parameters:
        updateUser - binded form data
        bindingResult - result of form binding
        model - for storing model data to render in view (Populated by Spring)
        userDetails - currently authenticated user (Populated by Spring)
        Returns:
        on successful redirects to home page otherwise return form with error
        Since:
        2020-05-17
